apps.name: Solar Beam
apps.description:
Solar Beam: Your Window to the Universe

Embark on an interstellar journey with Solar Beam, the ultimate space exploration app designed exclusively for your Apple TV.  Immerse yourself in the wonders of the cosmos from the comfort of your living room.

apps.name: SForesight
apps.description:
SForesight: The Ultimate SF Symbols Search Companion

Are you tired of endless scrolling through the official SF Symbols app.  Say hello to SForesight, the game-changing macOS app that revolutionizes how Swift developers find and use SF Symbols in their projects.

apps.name: Double Kick
apps.description:
Double Kick - Your Global Menu Companion

One-time purchase, no subscriptions, no ads - your passport to understanding any menu worldwide. 

Transform any restaurant menu into an interactive guide, no matter where you are in the world.

apps.name: Psywave
apps.description:
Psywave: Your Musical Mind Reader

Unleash the power of machine learning to craft your perfect playlist with Psywave.  No more endless scrolling or manual curation – describe your mood and watch as Psywave conjures up a tailor-made soundtrack for your moment.

apps.name: Dream Eater
apps.description:
Dream Eater: ML-Powered Dream Journal & Interpreter

Dive into the fascinating world of your subconscious with Dream Eater, the ultimate ML-powered dream journal and interpretation app.  Unlock the mysteries of your nightly adventures and gain deeper insights into your mind.

apps.name: Master of Inventory
apps.description:
Take control of your belongings with Inventory, the comprehensive personal inventory management app that helps you track, organize, and protect your valuable items. 

WHAT MAKES INVENTORY SPECIAL
• Smart Receipt Scanning: Use your camera to capture and store receipts with our built-in document scanner.

apps.name: Master of Flags
apps.description: This is Master of Flags, the game where you gather experience points (XP) and level up as you become familiar with the world's flags.  There are 196 different flags in this game.
